body:
**What happened**: ``` remote_runtime.go:173] ListPodSandbox with filter nil from runtime service failed: rpc error: code = ResourceExhausted desc = grpc: trying to send message larger than max (8398577 vs. 8388608) kuberuntime_sandbox.go:210] ListPodSandbox failed: rpc error: code = ResourceExhausted desc = grpc: trying to send message larger than max (8398577 vs. 8388608) ``` **What you expected to happen**: `ListPodSandbox` should not fail because of it's response size. **How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: N/A. **Anything else we need to know?**: Run batches through Argo workflow, but I don't think it's specific to the workloads. **Environment**: - Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 1.12 - Cloud provider or hardware configuration: Amazon Linux 2 - OS (e.g: `cat /etc/os-release`): ``` NAME="Amazon Linux" VERSION="2" ID="amzn" ID_LIKE="centos rhel fedora" VERSION_ID="2" PRETTY_NAME="Amazon Linux 2" ANSI_COLOR="0;33" CPE_NAME="cpe:2.3:o:amazon:amazon_linux:2" HOME_URL="https://amazonlinux.com/" ``` - Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): ``` Linux ip-192-168-89-250.us-west-2.compute.internal 4.14.106-97.85.amzn2.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Mar 15 17:07:54 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux ```

My question is: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/62219e1f66d56fd663fd017e2f43e6dca6f41d59/pkg/kubelet/dockershim/remote/docker_server.go#L29-L31 limit is 8 MB. https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/62219e1f66d56fd663fd017e2f43e6dca6f41d59/pkg/kubelet/remote/utils.go#L27-L29 limit is 16 MB. 1. What's the difference between `pkg/kubelet/dockershim/remote` and `pkg/kubelet/remote`? `pkg/kubelet/dockershim/remote` is for Docker, and `pkg/kubelet/remote` is for containerd? Can somebody help understand the difference? 2. Why does `pkg/kubelet/dockershim/remote` have difference limit than `pkg/kubelet/remote`? I think we should give them the same limits. /cc @dims
